scripts.build: vue-tsc -b && vite build --mode production && npm run replace-widget-path
scripts.build-dev: vue-tsc -b && vite build --mode development && npm run replace-widget-path-dev
scripts.dev: npm run build-watch & npm run server
scripts.zip-widget: npm run cp-widget && npm run zip
scripts.widget: npm run bump-version && npm run build && npm run zip-widget
scripts.widget-dev: npm run bump-version && npm run build-dev && npm run zip-widget && npm run dev
